questions.question: Which of the following is the correct syntax to create a hyperlink in HTML?
What is the purpose of the <meta> tag in HTML?
options: To define the content type and character set
To create a section in a document
questions.answer: To define the content type and character set

questions.question: Which HTML attribute is used to define inline styles?
What does the <input type='checkbox'> element allow the user to do?
options: Select one or more options from a list
Select only one option from a list
questions.answer: Select one or more options from a list

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct way to create an ordered list in HTML?
What is the function of the <canvas> element in HTML5?
Which of the following HTML tags is used to define a table header?
What does the 'alt' attribute in an <img> tag specify?
Which of the following is correct about HTML forms?
options: The <form> element is used to collect user input
The <input> element must be used inside a <form> element
The <form> element can only contain one input field
The <form> element is used to link to external scripts
questions.answer: The <form> element is used to collect user input

questions.question: How can you make a text bold in HTML?
What is the correct HTML element for inserting a line break?
Which attribute is used to specify a unique identifier for an HTML element?
How do you create a drop-down list in HTML?
Which HTML element is used to define important text?
Which HTML attribute is used to define the inline frame?
What is the purpose of the 'charset' attribute in the <meta> tag?
options: To specify the character encoding used in the document
To link to an external stylesheet
questions.answer: To specify the character encoding used in the document

questions.question: Which of the following HTML elements is used to define a navigation bar?
Which HTML attribute specifies the URL of an external script file?
Which of the following is not a valid HTML5 tag?
How do you create a comment in HTML?
Which of the following HTML elements is used to define a section in a document?
Which attribute is used to open a link in a new tab or window?
What is the purpose of the <fieldset> element in HTML?
options: To group related elements in a form
To define a set of related links
To create a section for navigation
To add a background color to a section
questions.answer: To group related elements in a form

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to display a numbered list?
What does the 'name' attribute in the <input> tag specify?
options: The name of the input field
questions.answer: The name of the input field

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define the largest heading?
What is the correct HTML tag for making a text area?
What is the purpose of the 'placeholder' attribute in the <input> tag?
options: To display a hint to the user about what to enter in the field
To define the type of input
To set the size of the input field
questions.answer: To display a hint to the user about what to enter in the field

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define an unordered list?
What does the 'disabled' attribute do in HTML?
options: Disables user input for a form element
Prevents the element from being styled
questions.answer: Disables user input for a form element
